title: 8642 Canongate Ln
neighborhood: - Highlands Ranch - views of the Links Golf Course!
posting_body: AREA: HIGHLANDS RANCH - Links Golf Course!
Beautiful property, close to schools, lawn service included, on the Links golf course, quiet cul de sac, no front or back neighbors!
You will also have access to the Highlands Ranch Rec Center which includes pool w/ water slides, workout facilities and more!
Master includes large tub and separate tiles shower, walk-in closet, split vanities.
1 full bathroom upstairs and 1/2 bath on main level.
1 bedroom and full bathroom in the finished basement.
KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, garbage disposal.
Wood flooring on the main level, carpet on the stairs and upstairs, tile in all bathrooms, carpet on basement stairs and in the basement.
PARKING: Attached garage, driveway, and street.
BASEMENT: Fully finished basement with full bathroom and wet bar.
PETS: 2 Pets maximum considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
Initial lease will end in June.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
